lenders.name: Mike

Helping others with raising funds is more rewarding as it allows me to help more people as a group then individually.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help small start up businesses with FundRaiser 1.0 which enables everyone to raise the funds they need for their needs without the worry or concern to repay loans or interest expenses.  

This is the perfect system for anyone in the world who wants to raise funds for their business, non profit charity or for personal needs. With cost of setting up Fundraiser 1.0 Software only $4.99 U.S., it is within reach of everyone who needs funding.  www.Cash-Fundraiser.com

lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day trying to build meaningful reports from data collected over many years. These reports are meant to help the management of an organization in tracking status of activities, support its decision making process.

lenders.name: Imelda
lenders.loan_because: I am a 42 year old woman from the Philippines.I had a work before but due to the increasing rate of unemployment and job loss, I became one of them and and now I want to make a loan of $5000 because I want to put up a small restaurant since cooking has been and is still my passion and because I wanted to be out of the poverty group. I want to be one of those who still has the capability of making this world go round and help in making others know that they are still useful and not a burden to those around them. In other words, I want to ask for help so I can also give help to those who are also in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a call center agent before but because of clients who are affected by the crisis that we are having right now some accounts were pulled out and mine was included, hence my removal from the company. And also, I am now experiencing pain in my knees and I have uncontrollable hypertension, I cannot perform well at work coz it usually is at night time.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: While microloans don't replace the need for aid, I believe they can have a big impact. As the entrepreneurs increase their business, they'll create jobs both by their own hiring and the increased purchases they make from others.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software for a variety of embedded systems such as telephone equipment, automobiles, and aircraft.

lenders.name: Jay & Patti
lenders.loan_because: This a direct way to make a difference in people's lives that help them while permitting them to get assistance in a business like way so that they are not accepting charity.  They are on an equal footing with their lenders so this is a business relationship with ongoing business partners.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist employers in the design and administration of programs that they provide to their employees that cover them for medical costs and retirement planning.

lenders.name: Shray
lenders.loan_because: its my small way of hopefully making a tangible, long lasting difference in peoples lives via a "system" that respects and empowers them.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being a part of helping others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Many people don't get second chances, a new hope, or of the things we take for granted. My work is to help those that wouldn't otherwise get this hope and make it a reality.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to read books and come up with inane theories about how the world works.  Now I want to be a doctor.

-Dalai Lama, 1935

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: I am hoping to help out a bit.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student.

lenders.occupational_info: I make websites better.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said that how I respond to those in need is how I've responded to him.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent idea!

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: We are all one, connected by strings the eyes can't see.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the way white blood cells respond to bacteria, viruses and cancer with the hopes to design vaccines or treatments which are better and cheaper, and therefore more widely available.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I know that every little bit helps. I hope to assist some of the disadvantaged - but seemingly motivated - individuals that I find through my Kiva travels. If each of these I help can improve their lives and climb out of poverty through my small contribution, I can help make our world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make the world smaller by working on websites of all sizes, mostly on financial transactions.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Everyone who has the dream of creating a better life and the motivation to bring that dream to fruition deserves access to the initial resources they need to make it happen. We've been blessed tremendously in our own business, which also had its humble beginnings, albeit within the context of a much more stable economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an online publisher. I create topical websites that assist others in solving various problems.

lenders.name: Rangga
lenders.loan_because: From my family background, i came from a simple family, my dad is an employee with minimum wage, and my mother isn't working or have no career. So, very difficult for me to start my own business without any capitals. Therefore, i know how enterpreneurs out there who struggle for some amount of money to gain their capital needs!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Full time Designer, i have obsession about design industry, graduated from Visual Communication & Arts Faculty (PCU - Surabaya, Indonesia) in the year 2002, now decided to be a full time designer and enterpereneur.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: why wouldnt you?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a multinational software company

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: Somethimes its so easy helping people.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to help those who will help themselves, to the benefit of their community
lenders.occupational_info: I am kept well occupied in my retirement serving my Church, also Churches Together, and the CPRE which concerns itself with the wellbeing of rural communities. 4 children 9 grandchildren are a happy diversion

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I have a little bit to spare and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I imagine.

lenders.name: Roar
lenders.loan_because:
i can sometimes afford to.
Would like to help.

lenders.name: Lydia Ann
lenders.loan_because: I admire anyone and everyone that has a passionate dream and is willing to do whatever it takes to make thier dream come to fruition.  I hope that the funds I donate give people the beautiful gift of getting to see thier dreams unfold into reality.

lenders.name: Tarek
lenders.loan_because: I want to see if it really works!and if it`s works it`s a good thing!
lenders.occupational_info: I`m learning!!!

lenders.name: Arline
lenders.loan_because: The Bible tells us that we are to love others. I think it's important to help those who have a need and a drive. God bless you all for your strength, courage, and vision.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit. My goal is to help as many as I can, as often as I can, and with grace.

lenders.name: Sibylle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people be successful.

lenders.name: Vern and Jane
lenders.loan_because: I think assisting people who are trying to improve their lives is a worthwhile venture.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I want to make a positive difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
We have been together for almost 15 years and we have two beautiful children that mean everything to us.

Nicole is a physical therapist and I sing for senior citizens.  I also have a small real estate company that owns nine rental apartments.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I feel that direct empowerment is the best way to help our fellow humans.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to be better leaders.

lenders.name: Sverre
lenders.loan_because: Costing so little - helping so much. While we barely notice the money we lend is gone, it makes a significant difference to the borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently studying economics and management.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: We who are fortunate should help those who are striving to better themselves and the world around them.

lenders.name: Nyani-lisha
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make the world better.
lenders.occupational_info: A secretary, no coffee

lenders.name: Lee Anne
lenders.loan_because: This is a way to connect with people and hopefully give others the opportunities that are easily available to many people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students in Goshen, Ky.  Most of the kids I teach are 16-17 year olds.  I teach reading and writing and I love my job!

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to better their  lives

lenders.name: Laura Dove
lenders.loan_because: If I can, I should.  A tiny fraction of my own income can make a huge difference in someone else's life.  I wish everyone would do this!

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I believe sustainable, economic well-being is critical to the future of our world.  I also lend because I believe I can make a difference through KIVA.  It seems I can make a difference in a micro-economy whereas my numbers are lost in the macro-economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the universities in the US operate more efficiently and effectively by using computer systems.  By more efficiently, I mean at lower cost.  By more effectively, I mean doing a better job of educating our students.

lenders.name: Bettina
lenders.loan_because: their must be hope for anybody
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a networker for museums

lenders.name: RaHa
lenders.loan_because: I owe it to the rest of the world to help them!
lenders.occupational_info: I find it hard to find time to give back to the community. I'm so glad i can contribute in a tiny way to someone so far away...

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given the chance to succeed.

lenders.name: christer
lenders.loan_because: I believe this will actually help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I study to become a teacher

lenders.name: Josie
lenders.loan_because: I admire the pluck and scrap of each entrepeneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to advance their careers.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I hope I am changing someone's life for the better.  It may be a small loan but I hope it makes a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working on my doctorate program to help people teach young children who have Asperger's Syndrome (early intervention).  I am also a mother to three boys and stay home with them (when not in school).

lenders.name: Paul M
lenders.loan_because: I can, and if I can (and feel it is the right thing to do), I should. So I do.

lenders.name: Mohan
lenders.loan_because: God is the God of the Poor, the Disabled, the Oppressed and the Outcastes of Society. That is why Jesus descended in Humility from Heaven to Earth, death on the Cross and the depths of Hell to rise Triumphant to the Highest Heavens again.
lenders.occupational_info: Christians know no barriers between nations, communities and individuals in the building of God's kingdom of Love. May all the citizens of the rich world (North and South) lend freely to keep money moving to do good constantly. God bless you all.

lenders.name: Debi
lenders.loan_because: A hand up is the best I can give, it's like teaching a man to fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I help in my husband's construction business.

lenders.name: Prima
lenders.loan_because: It promotes Peace.

lenders.name: Margarita
lenders.loan_because: Its the best way to give people a chance!

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: there's to much injustice in the world

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people, and I feel like I've been blessed with the resources to give something back.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to contribute a little in helping out this world.

lenders.name: Deneene
lenders.loan_because: I think people deserve a chance for sucsees . With this global technology we are getting  to help those we never could help before
lenders.occupational_info: I am the middle woman between wholesale and retial in the auto industry. I write book about grief and spirituality

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: Others also need a chance.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Micro finance can end poverty unlike anything else yet created.
lenders.occupational_info: I work along side doctors and nurses to help people who are sick and injured.

lenders.name: Kaye
lenders.loan_because: I have visited Central America, and I have enjoyed the beauty of their countries and the hospitality of their people.  I love it there, and I hope to move there someday.  So in a way, I am investing in my future, too.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: If we want to make a difference in the world, we have to start somewhere.  Why not here and now?  "Be the change you want to see in the world." ~Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I work to build a better community and preserve our natural world for future generations.

lenders.name: Cameron
lenders.loan_because: I love to empower human potential

lenders.name: Elissa
lenders.loan_because: Even the smallest bit of help can make a big difference.

lenders.name: LjB
lenders.loan_because: It is such a sweet privilege to be able to touch folks around the world in small ways that aggregate to make such a huge difference!

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Tzveta
lenders.loan_because: What comes around goes around.

lenders.name: Anders Ulrik
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable other people to make a difference in their own life.

lenders.name: Steve & Ky
lenders.loan_because: We are able to...  people helping people is what the world is all about, isn't it?

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I can.  What little I have is a fortune to many others.  If I can just help  one person at a time to better his or her life, it is worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a jack of all trades.  I teach math and social studies to middle schoolers.  I am  a mother , a cook, a builder, a gardener, etc.

lenders.name: The Girlfriends
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Jills Grandchildren
lenders.loan_because: Our Grandmother Jill Kidder would have wanted us too.
lenders.occupational_info: We are the grandchildren of Jill Kidder, who died in June 2008 at the age of 84.  She showed us that our work will always be to help where we can.

lenders.name: Nata
lenders.loan_because: we live in a global community.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Cameron
lenders.loan_because: micro-finance is one of the most efficient means of poverty reduction.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: when the whole transaction is completed there is an affirmation to my belief in the human spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom, and now I help my daughters raise their daughters.  The best job in the world.

lenders.name: Brianne
lenders.loan_because: I think it helps people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children how to sing and play music.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and fortunate in my life, whether the result of hard work or sheer luck or a combination of both.  To offer someone the opportunity to make their life or circumstances better is a rare gift indeed.  You know what they say about teaching a man to fish ...

lenders.name: ZephyrWoods
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay it forward

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: Kiva seems like a wonderful way to help people make their lives better.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I feel that those of us fortunate to be born into countries like the USA have an opportunity to be of service and to help our neighbors on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work behind the scenes in Television Production.

lenders.name: PremiumTalk
lenders.loan_because: We like this concept
lenders.occupational_info: Develop software that allows small businesses to safely sell services via phone, chat or video.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I can and because I believe that micocredit is a very powerful tool to help development.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: because I can and it helps others to improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure our company has a good computer system that can help get the material and services needed to keep the steel making business we all work for profitable.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, The faces of the women I lend to inspire and give perspective on my life:  my challenges are nothing compared to the struggles of these courageous people to survive and thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work hard to insure that people live bigger lives.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help along life's way, this is my chance to make a small difference in the life of a person whom I've never formally met.
lenders.occupational_info: I help set up medications for people in assisted living homes in Arizona.  I make sure they are not given medications that interact with each other, are spaced out properly throughout the day, and don't cause harm with any other illness/disease the person may have.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because:
God has been good to me !!!
I believe If you are willing to work you should get the chance

lenders.name: Bette
lenders.loan_because: I am incredibly fortunate to have more than I need - and seem to forget that fact, frequently. Being connected to this organization helps me to maintain a global perspective and be a global citizen. (Also, my friends Molly, Kregg, and Quinn told me to...Thanks, guys!)
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a college

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: My godparents thought it was important for me to spread God's love by helping those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Cry, Eat, Sleep, Cry, Eat, Sleep...........

lenders.name: Bob & Sue
lenders.loan_because: Our grandchildren started and told us we should loan as well.  Out of the mouths of babes....

lenders.name: Dara
lenders.loan_because: I should

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: I have also been an entrepreneur
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician and a music teacher

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: My Mother always told me "If you work hard, stay passionate about what you do and keep a humble soul...the sky is the limit".  These folks have passion, hope and deserve a chance to fly.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in aviation retail for the last 12 years, we supply flight crews the products needed for the job.  crewoutfitters.com!

lenders.name: Forhim Technologies
lenders.loan_because: We're committed as a company to helping others succeed as we grow.
lenders.occupational_info: We are diligently committed to developing affordable and award winning POS solutions extensively covering various business needs.
